message.content:
1. Muscle mass was evaluated with US.
2. The evaluation involved measuring the cross sectional diameter (CSD).
3. The measurement was taken of the vastus intermedius.
4. The measurement was also taken of the rectus femoris.
5. The vastus intermedius and the rectus femoris are parts of the quadriceps muscle.

messages.content:
Statement: Muscle mass was evaluated with US, by measuring the cross sectional diameter (CSD) of the vastus intermedius and the rectus femoris of the quadriceps muscle.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
